## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5d86b4c4ce77a41bee827eb614c38868e1231feef6629f9baf9cc665e472f530)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'octolytics' @ 0.19.0 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
